alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT JEFFERSON...EAST CENTRAL LEON... NORTHERN MADISON...SOUTHWESTERN LOWNDES...SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS AND SOUTHERN BROOKS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Madison to 15 miles south of Monticello. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Lake Park, Quitman, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Dasher, Greenville, Alma, Dills, Grooverville, Lamont, Hamburg, Pinetta, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Lovett, Nankin, Casa Blanco, and Empress. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
